section.name: USFM TeX Mapping Information
section.description: This section contains all the information needed to map this font for use with the usfmTeX macro package used in TeX.
Include information that will allow this font to be used as a primary font. This includes settings for regular, italic, bold, and bolditalic.

setting.name: Regular
setting.description: The \def setting for the usfmTeX regular typeface rendering.

setting.name: Italic
setting.description: The \def setting for the usfmTeX italic typeface rendering.

setting.name: Bold
setting.description: The \def setting for the usfmTeX bold typeface rendering.

setting.name: BoldItalic
setting.description: The \def setting for the usfmTeX bolditalic regular typeface rendering.
